TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Screen extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示单个系统上的一个或多个显示设备。

span.span: Represents a display device or multiple display devices on a single system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此对象的构造函数不是公共的，因此不能显式创建 对象。The constructor for this object is not public, so you cannot explicitly create a object. 对象是在调用其公共方法时创建的。The object is created when you call its public methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类的各种方法和属性。The following code example shows how to use various methods and properties of the class. 该示例调用 属性来检索所有连接到系统的屏幕的数组。The example calls the property to retrieve an array of all the screens connected to the system. 对于每个返回的 ，该示例将设备名称、边界、类型、工作区和主屏幕添加到 。For each returned , the example adds the device name, bounds, type, working area, and primary screen to a . 若要使用此示例，请将 和 添加到窗体中，然后为该按钮添加 事件处理程序。To use the example, add a and a to a form, and then add a event handler for the button. [!code-cpp[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，使用位图时，屏幕上每个像素的位数很有用。Typically, the number of bits per pixel for a screen is useful when working with bitmaps. 有关位图的详细信息，请参阅[位图类型](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps)。For more information about bitmaps, see [Types of Bitmaps](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于单个显示系统，只显示主显示器。For a single display system, the primary display is the only display. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of property and the method. 此方法需要一个包含名为 `Button1`的按钮的窗体。This method requires a form containing a button named `Button1`. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkingArea As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle WorkingArea { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

summary.span: 获取显示器的工作区。

span.span: Gets the working area of the display.

summary.span: 工作区是显示器的桌面区域，不包括任务栏、停靠窗口和停靠工具栏。

span.span: The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars.

value.span: 一个 ，表示显示器的工作区。

span.span: A , representing the working area of the display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作区是显示器的桌面区域，不包括任务栏、停靠窗口和停靠工具栏。The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars. 如果 Windows 任务栏设置为 "自动隐藏"，则 将返回屏幕的整个区域，无论任务栏当前是否显示。 will return the entire area of the screen if the Windows Taskbar is set to Auto-Hide, no matter whether the Taskbar is currently displayed or not.
